content.text:
[@Keith](@fTDfz5IUyBhnDFO9caZGCoEEAd6cj6Kqk0BQ7Md7VYY=.ed25519) 

Sorry to hear you're having a hard time with the latest Patchwork. I think your Ubuntu might be too old to support Patchwork. I tried looking up Ubuntu 13 but I can't find the package list, could you maybe try updating to one of the supported Ubuntu LTS versions? Ubuntu 14 is a bit outdated but would *probably* be supported, but if you could make the jump to 16/18 that would be ideal.
